title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Friday 21 August 2015 - BBC News
summary: a building that was ram raided in irchester high street will have to be demolished .
about 100 employees of indesit at raunds took industrial action .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 on friday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: our live coverage across the day

documents.title: northampton chronicle : 'my hair does n't define me ' says 9-year-old alopecia sufferer
text: a nine-year-old from northamptonshire who has alopecia decided to battle back and shave her hair all off .

documents.title: weather : sunny evening
text: an increasingly sunny evening will lead into a largely dry , clear night .
the wind will be light south or southwesterly , with temperatures dropping to 14c ( 57f ) .
saturday will be a largely fine , dry day with long spells of hot , hazy sunshine and the risk of an isolated thunderstorm in the afternoon .
temperatures climbing up to 28c ( 82f ) in places .
author: Dan Holley
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: northamptonshire news : rail academy and rothwell remains
text: this is what we 've been talking about today :
author: Anna Bartlett
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: raunds indesit workers want better pay offer
text: warehouse workers at indesit in raunds have been striking today after they rejected a 1.5 % pay increase offer .
they are among more than 200 staff across the country , who are also planning to strike for 48 hours on 27 august and 24 hours on 1 september .
unite regional officer mark plumb said : `` they are seeking a substantial increase in their basic pay after years of below inflation pay rises . ''
author: Craig Lewis
BBC News

documents.title: man assaulted in corby
text: a 21-year-old man was assaulted .
at around 08:30 on tuesday , 18 august , in the earlstree industrial estate , corby .
the man was walking to work when he was approached by another man who punched him .
police are appealing for witnesses to the incident which happened close to golden wonder factory .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: awards ceremony for those who hand out flyers at edinburgh fringe
text: a man from northampton who set up an awards ceremony at the edinburgh fringe festival says there 's been a big demand for him to repeat it at this year 's event .
conor fitzhenry from kingsthorpe set up the flyerers award , recognising the work of people who hand out flyers at the festival .
irish comedian david o'docherty is hosting the awards show which take place at the end of the month .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: plane crash crew honoured with memorial
text: the crew of an american plane who lost their lives when it hit a radio mast in daventry and crashed in 1944 are finally being honoured in the town this weekend .
a plaque will be unveiled on daventry 's war memorial on sunday afternoon by one of the relatives of the nine men who died on board the b17 bomber .
artefacts from the crash site will go on display in the town 's museum for the next month .
author: Martin Heath
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: cricket : wakely the man for a crisis
text: alex wakely has made his fourth first-class century , and now his highest first-class score too , to help northants battle back on day one against leicestershire .
his previous hundred this season - at cheltenham - came in similar circumstances .
wakely the man for a crisis it seems .
northants are currently 293-7 at wantage road .
author: Alex Winter
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: patrick mcloughlin : northampton 'key ' to delivering rail and road trainees
text: transport secretary patrick mcloughlin says northampton will be key to delivering new rail and road trainees from an academy in kings heath .

separately , northampton college has announced it 'll train young people for future careers in the logistics industry , which is expected to double in size in northamptonshire over the next six years .
james whybrow , assistant principal at northampton college urged youngsters to `` think about a career in logistics , it is n't what you think . ''
author: Stuart Ratcliffe
BBC Look East

documents.title: transport secretary 'impressed ' with northampton 's new rail academy
text: transport secretary patrick mcloughlin says he 's really impressed by a new rail academy in northampton which will will play a big part in delivering 30,000 new road and rail industry apprenticeships .
the academy at kings heath will be fully operational in october , and will teach young people about rail maintenance .
mr mcloughlin said the industry could provide a great future for young people interested in a career in infrastructure .
author: Stuart Ratcliffe
BBC Look East

documents.title: george north 'suffered slurred speech ' after rugby ko
text: the girlfriend of saints winger george north has revealed he suffered slurred speech after being knocked unconscious playing rugby .
north is set to return to action for the first time in five months when wales play ireland in a world cup warm up match a week tomorrow .
and becky james - his girlfriend and a world champion cyclist - says she 's been worried for him .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: artists invited to apply for funding
text: artistic people in the corby area are being invited to apply for funding to help make their creative ideas happen .
up to £ 5,000 is available for each project - from made in corby 's big ideas fund .
projects such as music , dance , film , painting and photography will all be considered .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: indesit 'disappointed ' over strike action
text: indesit says it 's disappointed that the unite union has decided to take part in industrial action over pay .
about 100 staff at the company 's raunds depot are on strike today .
it is part of a continuing national action .
the company says that it has improved its pay offer and is keen to continue discussions with the union .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: transport secretary announces two new apprenticeship schemes
text: two major new apprenticeship schemes have been announced in northamptonshire today - including 30,000 new apprenticeship places for road and rail training .
transport secretary patrick mcloughlin says northampton will be key to delivering the rail and road trainees .
northampton college says it 'll train young people for future careers in the logistics industry , which is expected to double in size in northamptonshire over the next six years .
author: Stuart Ratcliffe
BBC Look East

documents.title: radio northampton : the story of the wreck of the us b17
text: radio northampton reporter martin heath will be talking about the us b17 later - here 's a little tease from his twitter account .
martin heath
heathm50
cap found in the wreck of a u.s. b17 which crashed in daventry in 1944 .
i 'm telling the story this pm on bbc nton .
cap found in the wreck of a u.s. b17 which crashed in daventry in 1944 .
i 'm telling the story this pm on bbc nton .

documents.title: northampton chronicle : sevens pub to undergo £ 150,000 refurbishment
text: a pub in northampton will be closed for a month while it undergoes a refurbishment .
author: Northampton Chronicle & Echo

documents.title: mother and child harassed in corby park
text: a woman who was walking with her daughter in a park in corby was approached by a drunken man who harassed her .
the incident happened on monday between 17.20 and 17.30 between holbein walk and bonnington walk in the town .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: cricket : northants struggling in leicestershire clash
text: i am at wantage road for the first day of the county championship match between northamptonshire and leicestershire .
it has been a morning of struggle for northamptonshire , reduced to 42-4 having lost the toss , before captain alex wakely settled to steer his side to lunch in better shape at 89-4 .
but it should have got worse straight after the break - josh cobb badly dropped at first slip .
hard work is needed to improve things for the hosts .
author: Alex Winter
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: ram raided ircheser building may have to be demolished
text: a building that was ram raided in irchester this morning may have to be demolished - according to wellingborough council .
ram raiders took used a fork lift truck to steal a cash machine from the shop just before 02:00 this morning .
they put the cash machine on the back of another vehicle and made off from the scene .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: book marks 50 years since northampton town 's glory season
text: it 's 50 years since northampton town 's only season in the top flight of english football and the author of a book telling the story of that season has been reprinted to mark the anniversary .
`` a whole scene going '' by derrick thompson was first published in 2008 and remembers the 1965-'66 season , when the cobblers were narrowly relegated .
the club had previously had a meteoric rise from the old fourth division to the top flight .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: police appeal following ram raid in irchester
text: northamptonshire police would like to speak to anyone who may have witnessed a ram raid in irchester .
officers would also like to speak to anyone who may have seen a fork lift truck and another vehicle approaching irchester shortly before 02:00 .
anyone with information should call police on 101 .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: police warning after rise of bike thefts
text: police say motorbike thieves in the county have mainly targeted smaller bikes up to 125cc , but some larger bikes and a quadbike have also been stolen .
the 68 thefts have happened both during the day and overnight .
more than half of them have happened in northampton , with others in corby , rushden , kettering , wellingborough , daventry , irthlingborough and higham ferrers .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: road closures after ram raid in irchester
text: a stretch of road in irchester is closed after the ram raid there in the early hours of this morning .
station road to wollaston road junction remains closed .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: rothwell remains are hundreds of years old
text: have you been inside the bone crypt at holy trinity church in rothwell yet ?
the university of sheffield is researching the human remains which are hundreds of years old .
if you 've not been in the crypt yet , there 's an open day on saturday - or you can watch a sneak preview on the bbc northampton facebook page .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northamptonshire telegraph : new address for rushden post office
text: rushden post office is set to move from wilkinson 's in the town to a pharmacy in the high street .
author: Northamptonshire Telegraph

documents.title: ram raid at shop in irchester high street
text: police are appealing for witnesses after a ram raid at a shop in high street , irchester in the early hours of this morning .
offenders used a fork lift truck to steal a cash machine from a shop at about 01:55 .
they put the cash machine on the back of another vehicle and made off from the scene .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: transport secretary announces 30,000 new apprenticeships
text: the transport secretary has announced 30,000 apprenticeships for road and rail during a visit to northampton .
patrick mcloughlin was speaking from the site of a new rail academy in kings heath , which will be fully operational from october .
author: Stuart Ratcliffe
BBC Look East

documents.title: spate of bike thefts across northamptonshrie
text: police in northamptonshire are encouraging people to take extra steps to keep their motorbikes secure following an increase in motorcycle thefts over recent weeks .
sixty eight motorbikes have been stolen across the county between 1 july and 17 august .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: rothwell ancient human remains go on display
text: human remains believed to date from the 1300s will be on show tomorrow at holy trinity church in rothwell , which is opening the doors of its crypt from 10:00 until 16:00 to the public .
university of sheffield researchers have spent three years researching the crypt and the remains of 3,000 people interred there .
they now want to hear the stories of people who 've lived in rothwell on what the crypt means to them and their community .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: daventry day of action to combat crme
text: a day of action is being organised in daventry , to try and interest people in getting involved with combating crime and anti-social behaviour .
a mobile police station and a fire engine will be on display in the town centre , and it is hoped residents will sign up to park watch and allotment watch .
the town has had a number of incidents of vandalism and arson since may , including the setting on fire of a golf buggy on a bridge at the country park .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northants news : indesit strike and rothwell remains
text: this is what we 're talking about this morning :
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: transport secretary patrick mcloughlin in northampton
text: transport secretary patrick mcloughlin is in northampton this morning to announce an expansion to a rail training academy , set to fully open in october .
the government faced criticism when it `` paused '' the electrification of the midland mainline through northamptonshire - and expanding rail training in northampton would be a good way of doing it .
author: Stuart Ratcliffe
BBC Look East

documents.title: daventry express : village launches own community car scheme
text: a community car scheme has launched in a village near daventry to help people without their own transport , or who have limited mobility .
author: Daventry Express

documents.title: raunds indesit line among 12 nationwide
text: strike action at indesit in raunds is also taking place at 11 other depots across the country .
mark plum from the union unite said : `` it will have an impact on their ability to deliver to the customers that they service . ''
indesit has not responded to our queries as yet .
author: Craig Lewis
BBC News

documents.title: raunds indesit strike to disrupt white goods delivery
text: around 100 employees of indesit at raunds have joined colleagues around the country in taking industrial action .
they will be on strike for 24 hours , as part of a dispute over pay .
the union unite says the action is likely to affect the delivery of white goods such as fridges and washing machines .
author: Craig Lewis
BBC News

documents.title: afc rushden & diamonds on the rise
text: for a club that only existed for 20 years , rushden & diamonds crammed plenty in .
four promotions in 11 seasons took them up to english football 's third tier , but were followed by two relegations , expulsion from the conference and their eventual dissolution in 2011 .
supporters decided to create a phoenix club in afc rushden & diamonds - and that side is now on the rise .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: northamptonshire headlines : training schemes and indesit strike
text: here are the stories we 're looking at this morning :
author: Tom Percival
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: weather : cloudy but becoming brighter
text: it will be a largely cloudy start to the day with the chance of the odd spot of rain in places .
with the sunshine and light winds , it will turn very warm by the afternoon .
maximum temperature : 25c ( 77f ) .
watch the full forecast with elizabeth rizzini .

documents.title: northamptonshire live : how you can get in touch
text: what 's going in the news today : why do n't you tell us ?
if you have a story you think we should be talking about drop us an email or post to our facebook page .
author: Craig Lewis
BBC News
